message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your position on the budget. While $11,500 reflects the true value of this product, I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $10,750?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10,500.
